title: Take The Kills, Take The CS, But Don't Take The Ward Gold.

replies.body: If i have to invest 800 gold as one of my first items just for the sake of warding, then dedicate my trinket to destroying enemy wards, you better not steal my damn 30 gold.
IIRC Sweeper gives bonus gold to the person who finds the ward. So does pink
http://static2.gamespot.com/uploads/square_avatar/1551/15516851/2941771-lfs20.png

You would think that with all the things a support has to do and buy on top of the abysmal gold income people would at least let you get the gold from the wards _you are clearing_.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
That's illogical. Supports are supposed to give all available gold to their carries. Why is this suddenly thrown out the window with ward gold?
good teams do

And after they do it I'm just sitting here like...

https://media.giphy.com/media/mpQkJpBMbSxMs/giphy.gif

And then no one will let me last hit for my relic shield late game either...

This so much.
This is why I hate playing tank supports qq
ADC: "wtf report Braum he's stealing CS"
It hurts me. They just stand there waiting for my slowass auto to whittle it down to 1 health, then BAM!!
That ward's face though.

He died like he lived. Carefree and smiling, having never harmed anyone.
And we stand here, arguing over who deserved his corpse. For Shame.
I rather have no Gold than the Split 15 gold, gets me so mad everytime
When I support, I leave last-hitting these for others on purpose. I give them everything else - minions, kills that are one auto away from death. Why are wards different?
For most supports, clearing wards is their _only_ independent source of gold right behind their income items. There's no point in "helping" when a support can do it just fine all by themselves.

It is alright for supports to take depending on how far ahead your ADC is to the rest of the opposition. There is no need to starve yourself if your whole team is sitting like Scrooge Mcduck.

I complain about it in all chat

I have a tendency to complain about things. It doesn't improve anything, but it makes me feel better.

If supports wanted gold then they shouldnt walk away from it.  Im talking to all the supports who ward a bush with a pink in it THEN WALK AWAY.  or the supports who sweep late game and see farsite wards AND DONT KILL THEM EITHER.

I agree if they walk away and don't show they want it; but in the post it is clearly shown that the support was in the process of destroying the ward before the carry took the last hit,~~ thereby being a scumbag~~
